center.description: Determines whether items must be centered with their icon, false by default
center.description_zh: 确定项目是否必须以其图标居中，默认情况下为 false

icon.description: Icon that replaces list item dot

listStyleType.description: Controls list-style-type, by default inferred from type
listStyleType.description_zh: 控件 list-style-type，默认从 type 推断

size.description: Controls font-size and line-height, 'md' by default
size.description_zh: 控制 font-size 和 line-height，默认为 'md'

spacing.description: Key of theme.spacing or any valid CSS value to set spacing between items, 0 by default
spacing.description_zh: key，或任何有效的 CSS 值来设置项目之间的间距，默认为 0

type.description: List type: ol or ul, 'unordered' by default
type.description_zh: 列表类型：ol 或 ul，默认为 'unordered'

withPadding.description: Determines whether list items should be offset with padding, false by default
withPadding.description_zh: 确定是否应使用填充偏移列表项，默认情况下为 false
